revision.comment: Imported article from the Zandronum wiki that carries a different setting for the A_FireRailgun that differs from ZDoom's standard settings.
revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_FireRailgun (Zandronum Version)}} <!-- Because ZDoom and Zandronum has different settings for this property, make it clear that this should not be confused with that from ZDoom [Tiger] --> {{STFeature}}
void '''A_FireRailgun''' (void)
== Usage ==
Starts the flash state and fire a single rail. This rail will do 75 damage in Deathmatch and other PvP gamemodes, and 200 in all other modes. This is different from [[A_FireRailgun]].
